green-pass-activation.title: Activate 3G Proof
green-pass-activation.description: With this application you can activate your 3G proof.
green-pass-activation.additional-information: Here you can scan a QR code or upload an existing PDF or image to activate your 3G proof for the period of its validity. Please note that this will still require you to obtain a ticket for rooms in order to comply with 3G rules.
green-pass-activation.success-activation-body: Your 3G proof has been successfully activated.
green-pass-activation.invalid-qr-code-body: This QR code is not a valid 3G proof. Please use another one or select the manual 3G inspection at the ticket store.
green-pass-activation.no-qr-code-body: No QR code was found in the uploaded document. Please use another document or select the manual 3G inspection at the ticket store.
green-pass-activation.data-protection: What does TU Graz do with your data? You can find the data protection declaration for the app "TU Graz Greenlight" here:
green-pass-activation.uploaded-success-message: A 3G proof has been successfully verified and is active for
green-pass-activation.uploaded-success-message-2: A 3G proof has been successfully verified and is active until
green-pass-activation.delete-certificate-failed-body: An error occurred while removing your 3G proof.
green-pass-activation.delete-certificate-success-body: Your 3G proof has been successfully removed.

acquire-ticket.title: Acquire ticket for a place
acquire-ticket.description: Here you can acquire a ticket for a location at TU Graz.
acquire-ticket.additional-information: This is needed to be allowed to enter a location at TU Graz. If you have activated a 3G proof, you can use it to log in directly at a location at TU Graz for a certain period of time. If you have not activated a 3G proof yet, please use the menu item
acquire-ticket.additional-information-2: to activate a proof. Alternatively, you can manually confirm that you are carrying 3G proof and be able to prove it in case of a manual control.
acquire-ticket.no-proof-found-message: No valid 3G proof was found. Please activate a valid 3G detection under the menu item
acquire-ticket.valid-proof-found-message: A valid 3G proof was found. Please select a location to create a ticket.
acquire-ticket.manual-proof-text: I certify that I am vaccinated, tested, or recovered and carry valid proof of such for the duration of my stay in this room and can present such proof in the event of a manual inspection.
acquire-ticket.create-ticket-success-body: The acquired ticket for {{place}} was successfully created.

show-active-tickets.title: Show all active tickets
show-active-tickets.description: Here you can see the list of all valid tickets. You have to show them in case of a manual control.
show-active-tickets.no-tickets-message: You do not have any valid tickets!

info.title: Information
info.description: With this application you get information about greenlight.tugraz.at.

error-login-message: You need to be logged in to use this function!
